articles.description: British and Irish Lions coach Andy Farrell makes two changes for the final Test against the Wallabies in Sydney on Saturday.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Blair Kinghorn and James Ryan in for final Test in Australia

articles.description: Ben Stokes has pushed himself to the limit and missing the fifth India Test at The Oval gives England a peek into their worst nightmare, says chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Ben Stokes gives England 'peek into their nightmare' in fifth India Test at The Oval

articles.description: Birmingham City minority owner Tom Brady questions former Blues manager Wayne Rooney's work ethic in a new Amazon Prime documentary series.
articles.title: Wayne Rooney: Tom Brady questions ex-Birmingham manager's work ethic in Amazon series

articles.description: Two-time Olympic champion Laura Dahlmeier dies aged 31 after a mountaineering accident in Pakistan.
articles.title: Laura Dahlmeier: Olympic star dead after mountaineering accident in Pakistan

articles.description: France want to make up for lost time with a long-term relationship with the British and Irish Lions says federation vice-president Abdel Benazzi
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: France want regular games against tourists - Benazzi

articles.description: BBC Scotland looks at how Rangers overcame Panathinaikos as their Champions League qualifying task continues.
articles.title: Rangers valiant but vulnerable as Panathinaikos beaten in Champions League

articles.description: Arsenal have signed six players so far this summer, but it is a 15-year-old catching the eye on their tour of Asia.
articles.title: Max Dowman: Arsenal's 15-year-old making a pre-season impact

articles.description: Chelsea agree a fee for Ajax defender Jorrel Hato, subject to Ajax supervisory board approval.
articles.title: Jorrel Hato: Chelsea agree deal for Ajax defender in potential eighth signing of summer

articles.description: Hansie Cronje's story, re-examined in Sport's Strangest Crimes on BBC Sounds, is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma.
articles.title: Hansie Cronje, match-fixing and the plane crash which left a complex legacy

articles.description: Athletes who want to compete in the female category for world ranking competitions will have to take a one-time gene test, says World Athletics.
articles.title: World Athletics introduces one-time genetic test for athletes wanting to compete in female category for world ranking competitions
